title: T209-2,T210-8 and E90-1 Walsh For Sale
author: mzm55

posts.post_title: T209-2,T210-8 and E90-1 Walsh For Sale
posts.post_content:
I am selling the cards featured below. All of the T210s are series 8s and are low grade, please see my pictures for details.  The T209 is an absolute blazer and would grade EX if it weren’t for the minor crease at the bottom right corner, it’s one of the nicest examples from the set that I have seen. Shipping is on me.


T209-2 Forque: $250
T210-8 Lot (I will break this up if a few parties are interested): $650

Thanks for looking and please write with any questions.

Zach R.
[url]Mzm55@mac.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i102.photobucket.com/albums/m84/mzm55cards/IMG_0001.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i102.photobucket.com/albums/m84/mzm55cards/IMG_0002.png[/IMG]

The Walsh is sold. I'll listen to offers on the remaining cards if anyone is interested. 

Thanks!

Bump for a large price cut.

The price on the T209 is now $175 and the T210s $100 per card.
